title: Episode 21: Daniella Mason Pt. 1
description:
On today's episode, Kailey sits down with one of her very best friends, Daniella Mason. From college roomates to bridesmaids, to running side by side in their callings,  Kailey and Daniella have a friendship of 15 years and counting. Join them as they reminisce on the past and  share some laughs and tears about life's best and hardest  moments they've experienced together.

Listen to Daniella Mason's music here!
